name: Say Aloe To My Little Friend
name_original: Say Aloe To My Little Friend
description:
SAY ALOE TO MY LITTLE FRIEND

a ludum dare 46 game

So, it comes down to you and the last plant on Earth. An Aloe plant. A plant of life. Too bad wasteland raiders want to destroy it. Protect your plant from the terrible outlaws by using your garden shears to show them whose the boss. Don't forget your water hose. The plant will die in the sun, so keep it refreshed with water, and maybe use some of that water to slow your enemies. Run to the fire hydrants to refill your water tank when you run low. And don't worry about dying, the raiders aren't interested in you, only your plant.

WASD to move, RMB to use your Garden Shears, LMB to use your hose. SPACE BAR to pump a hydrant.

Uploaded a new version that removed a game breaking bug and adjusted some UI that would occasionally block the shop. Updated the distance text so that it could still be read after butchering tons of enemies. Fixed some math that was causing inconsistent damage and regeneration numbers.
